turns.original_utterance: Hello. I would like to discuss the issues of my contract.
turns.input: Hi there. I wanted to talk about the terms of my contract.
I would like a position of project manager
turns.augmented_input_bak: I think it would be best if you took on the role of a Programmer.

turns.input: I would like you to take the position of a Programmer
I'm accepting the programmer position. Can we discuss how we can agree on other issues? I was hoping for a salary of 120,000.
turns.original_utterance: I accept programmer position. Now let's talk about how we can agree on other issues. I would like a salary of 120,000

turns.input: How about a salary of 90,000? That way we could meet in the middle on pay.
turns.original_utterance: Would you be willing to accept a salary of 90,000?  I think we can meet in the middle on pay

turns.input: I'm afraid that won't work for me. I'm expecting a salary of 120,000.
turns.original_utterance: I reject 90,000. I am expecting a salary of 120,000

turns.input: I'm sorry, 90,000 is the highest I can offer. We can always revisit the salary further down the line.
turns.original_utterance: 90000 is really the highest I can go.  Maybe we can come back to that topic later in the negotiation
I am willing to have a workday of 8 hours

turns.input: I would recommend a 10 hour workday, but would be willing to reduce it to 9 hours if you are willing to accept the 90,000 salary
turns.augmented_input_bak: Alright, I'd be willing to work 8 hours a day.

turns.input: I'm sorry, I can't agree to that. I need 8 hours of work a day and a salary of 120,000.
turns.original_utterance: I refuse. I want a workday of 8 hours and I am willing to have a salary of 120,000

turns.input: If you're not willing to be flexible, I don't think we'll be able to reach an agreement.
turns.original_utterance: I dont believe we are going to come to an agreement if you have no flexibility

turns.input: Alright, I'm willing to compromise on the hours and go up to 9 hours a day. But I'd like to renegotiate our agreement and move up to a project manager position.
turns.original_utterance: I am willing to have a workday of 9 hours. But I must change our previous agreement. I would like a position of project manager

turns.input: I think I am going to opt out at this time and try to find another candidate.  You are simply being too demanding
